import borders from'assets/theme-dark/base/borders';import colors from'assets/theme-dark/base/colors';var white=colors.white;var borderWidth=borders.borderWidth;var stepConnector={styleOverrides:{root:{color:'#9fc9ff',transition:'all 200ms linear','&.Mui-active':{color:white.main},'&.Mui-completed':{color:white.main}},alternativeLabel:{top:'14%',left:'-50%',right:'50%'},line:{borderWidth:"".concat(borderWidth[2]," !important"),borderColor:'currentColor',opacity:0.5}}};export default stepConnector;
